roadMap.description: Initial planning and preparation for Campaign 1
Mid-phase review and adjustment for Campaign 1
Final assessment and community engagement for Campaign 1

campaigns.name: Reforesting the Pyrenees
campaigns.description: Plant native trees in degraded areas of the Pyrenees mountain range.

roadMap.description: Site selection and community outreach.
Nursery preparation and seedling production.
Planting events and volunteer engagement.

campaigns.name: Clean Coast Catalonia
campaigns.description: Organize beach cleanups and raise awareness about marine pollution.

roadMap.description: Partner with local organizations and municipalities.
Organize monthly beach cleanup events.
Educational workshops and awareness campaigns.

campaigns.name: Butterfly Gardens in Schools
campaigns.description: Create butterfly gardens in schoolyards to promote biodiversity and education.

roadMap.description: Design and planning workshops with students.
Planting native wildflowers and creating butterfly habitats.
Monitoring and educational activities with students.

campaigns.name: Urban Agriculture in Community Gardens
campaigns.description: Empower communities to grow fresh produce in unused urban spaces.

roadMap.description: Secure funding and identify suitable locations.
Build garden beds and install irrigation systems.
Organize workshops on sustainable gardening techniques.

campaigns.name: Mangrove Restoration in Southeast Asia
campaigns.description: Protect coastal ecosystems and communities by restoring mangrove forests.

roadMap.description: Community outreach and awareness campaigns.
Nursery preparation and seedling propagation.
Large-scale mangrove planting events with volunteers.

campaigns.name: Renewable Energy Microgrids in Rural Africa
campaigns.description: Provide access to clean electricity and empower communities through renewable energy microgrids.

roadMap.description: Identify suitable communities and assess energy needs.
Secure funding and partner with local organizations.
Install solar panels, batteries, and microgrid infrastructure.

campaigns.name: Bee Hives on Urban Roofs
campaigns.description: Install and maintain beehives on urban rooftops to promote biodiversity and local honey production.

roadMap.description: Secure partnerships with building owners and beekeepers.
Install beehives, equipment, and access points.
Organize educational workshops and honey harvesting events.

campaigns.name: Community Composting Initiative
campaigns.description: Reduce waste and create nutrient-rich compost through community composting programs.

roadMap.description: Organize workshops and awareness campaigns on composting benefits.
Partner with local organizations and establish collection infrastructure.
Monitor progress, refine the program, and celebrate achievements.

campaigns.name: Healthy Food Access for Children
campaigns.description: Provide fresh, nutritious food to children in underserved communities through school gardens and mobile markets.

roadMap.description: Partner with schools and community organizations.
Build and maintain school gardens with student involvement.
Launch mobile markets and distribute fresh produce to families.

campaigns.name: Amazon Rainforest Conservation
campaigns.description: Protect the biodiversity and indigenous communities of the Amazon rainforest through sustainable forest management and education.

roadMap.description: Raise awareness and funding for rainforest conservation efforts.
Support sustainable livelihoods for indigenous communities.
Partner with local organizations to protect forests and combat deforestation.
